ygData.subject: Re: repeated yet again.
ygData.msgSnippet: My name is Phobia, I must talk to the Maximal commanders, I must put a stop to the senseless destruction on this planet. Our entire existence depends on it.

"My name is Phobia, I must talk to the Maximal commanders, I must put 
a stop to the senseless destruction on this planet. Our entire 
existence depends on it."

Phobia knew that sounding so desperate only gave the Maximals an 
advantage, he didn't care. The only way to put an end to this war was 
to make everyone realize just hoe much damage they're doing to this 
timeline.

The spider knew that this was just another peeon in the Maximal ranks 
but it was a start.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> OOC:( I got lucky and got 5 minutes to a comp)
> 
> ::Savanna::
> 
> She heard the distress call on her com link.  She opened the link.
> "Identify yourself"  She wasn't sure who or where this transmission 
> was comming from.  But her gut told her to try.
> "Who are you and what is your situation?"
> 
> 
> 
>
